languages.text: "Дитя Азуриана, обреченное провести вечность в одиночестве среди праха мон-кай... Не мне осуждать выбор твоего пути. Но душа моя скорбит — слышишь ли ты ее плач?"
"Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"
languages.original_text: "Дитя Азуриана, обреченное провести вечность в одиночестве среди праха мон-кай... Не мне осуждать выбор твоего пути. Но душа моя скорбит — слышишь ли ты ее плач?"

languages.text: "Kind von Asuryan, dazu verdammt, eine Ewigkeit allein inmitten des Staubs von Chem-Pan-Sey zu verbringen ... Es steht mir nicht zu, über die Wahl Eures Pfads zu urteilen, und doch ist meine Seele in Trauer — hört Ihr sie nicht weinen?"
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: "Kind von Asuryan, dazu verdammt, eine Ewigkeit allein inmitten des Staubs von Chem-Pan-Sey zu verbringen ... Es steht mir nicht zu, über die Wahl Eures Pfads zu urteilen, und doch ist meine Seele in Trauer — hört Ihr sie nicht weinen?"

languages.text: « Un enfant d'Asuryan, condamné à passer l'éternité seul, parmi les restes de mon-keigh retournés à la poussière... Ce n'est pas à moi de juger de la Voie que vous avez choisie, mais mon âme pleure à chaudes larmes... Entendez-vous sa complainte ? »
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: « Un enfant d'Asuryan, condamné à passer l'éternité seul, parmi les restes de mon-keigh retournés à la poussière... Ce n'est pas à moi de juger de la Voie que vous avez choisie, mais mon âme pleure à chaudes larmes... Entendez-vous sa complainte ? »

languages.text: «Hijo de Asuryan, condenado a pasar una eternidad a solas entre el polvo de los mon-keigh... No me corresponde juzgar tu senda elegida, pero mi alma llora... ¿Acaso no oyes su gemido?».
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: «Hijo de Asuryan, condenado a pasar una eternidad a solas entre el polvo de los mon-keigh... No me corresponde juzgar tu senda elegida, pero mi alma llora... ¿Acaso no oyes su gemido?».

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子よ、あなたはモン＝ケイの塵の中で永遠に孤独に過ごす運命にあるわ。あなたの選んだ道を判断するのは私の役目じゃない。でも、私の魂は悲嘆にくれている。この叫びが聞こえないの？」
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子よ、あなたはモン＝ケイの塵の中で永遠に孤独に過ごす運命にあるわ。あなたの選んだ道を判断するのは私の役目じゃない。でも、私の魂は悲嘆にくれている。この叫びが聞こえないの？」

languages.text: “阿苏焉的子嗣注定要沦落在猴子的尘埃之中，独自度过永恒的时光……我不该评判你的道途，但我的灵魂感到悲伤，难道你听不到它的呼喊吗？”
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

traits.locale_text: “阿苏焉的子嗣注定要沦落在猴子的尘埃之中，独自度过永恒的时光……我不该评判你的道途，但我的灵魂感到悲伤，难道你听不到它的呼喊吗？”

languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"

languages.text: "Asuryan'ın Çocuğu, ebediyeti mon-keighlerin külleri arasında tek başına geçirmeye mahkûm... Seçtiğin Yolu yargılamak bana düşmese de ruhumu hüzün kaplıyor... Haykırışlarını duymuyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Child of Asuryan, doomed to spend an eternity alone amid the dust of mon-keigh... It is not my place to judge your choice of Path, and yet, my soul grieves — do you not hear its cry?"
